articles.content: Sony’s smartphones have always differed from other handsets on the market, in that they never seemed to care about industry trends. This could be something as superficial as bezel sizes — Sony has ne… [+19412 chars]

articles.description: Publisher Neon Doctrine and developer Tanuki Game Studio have announced The Library of Babel, a stealth platformer coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch…
